short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to decorate Arabic text

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Decorating Arabic text has become easier than every. This extension allows you to do so without having to go to a standalone website or having to leave the current team. It decorates as you type, allows you to copy, and gives you a lot of decorating options to choose from. The tool also gives you the ability of mixing some English letters randomly in-place of equivalent Arabic ones.
